message.empty: ґ_Are you sure you want to delete this folder, ${title}_________________________________________________Ї?
message.mustBeEmpty: ґ_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted___________________________________________________Ї.
message.aFewCannotBeDeleted: ґ_A few items cannot be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting the rest_____________________________________________Ї?
message.mustBeEmptyProceed: ґ_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting these items_________________________________________________________________________________Ї?
message.cannotBeDeleted: ґ_The folder ${title} cannot be deleted because its items cannot be deleted___________________________________________________________Ї.
